definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: Thermodynamic parameters depict the endothermic nature of adsorption and the process is spontaneous.
sentences.chinese: 熱力學參數表明，吸附過程是自發的和吸熱的。

sentences.english: Black can improve the heat-absorbing capability and speed up the spring planting.
sentences.chinese: 黑色有助吸熱及提早春天種植。

sentences.english: The second endothermic peak (T3) is caused by the hard-segment crystal.
sentences.chinese: 第二個吸熱峯爲硬鏈節結晶所致，爲T3。

sentences.english: Selectcracking is a highly endothermic reaction process.
sentences.chinese: 柴油非臨氫降凝是強吸熱反應過程。

sentences.english: A bottom layer of nickel catalyst was provided to promote the endothermic reaction of steam and methane.
sentences.chinese: 底層鎳催化劑促進蒸汽和甲烷的吸熱反應。

sentences.english: Go from reactants to products, that becomes endothermic.
sentences.chinese: 從反應物到生成物的過程，是吸熱的。

sentences.english: The heat receiver is a key part of SDPS.
sentences.chinese: 吸熱器是熱動力發電系統關鍵部件之一。

sentences.english: Heat of respiration generated by all fresh fruits and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 所有的新鮮果蔬都會產生的呼吸熱。

sentences.english: Let's see. This is an endothermic, or exothermic, negative sign.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們看看這是吸熱，還是放熱負號。

sentences.english: This paper discusses in detail the problem on the mass loss and endothermic mechanism for charring material.
sentences.chinese: 詳細討論了低溫炭化材料的質量損失和吸熱機理。

sentences.english: Wider hinges also fold faster, because there is more surface area to absorb energy.
sentences.chinese: 摺痕角度越大，吸熱表面積越大，也可以摺疊的更快。
